title: Complane - Low peiorty
body:
Dears, 

please I now in the low priority to go out when the game is running but unfortunately the internet access connection id down and after the internet connection fixed I tried many times to return the game but the gamed showed me this massage " the intent is no access " please I want to play a normal game and I think I do not deserve the low priority 

Best Regards 
MOBLACKFighter

replies.body:
Those LPQ's should only kick in after the system notices a trend of recent leaves, but it does sound like you might wanna take a step back and try some general network troubleshooting before hopping back into matchmade games. I don't want you getting longer LPQ's for something you can try to fix!

Make sure you go through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and try using an ethernet connection as well for a more stable link. Test it in a custom/practice match and let me know if it seems to help!
